component.name: Qv2ray
component.summary: Qv2ray is a cross-platform v2ray graphical frontend written in Qt.

description.p: Qv2ray is a cross-platform v2ray graphical frontend written in Qt which can improve v2ray user experience. It can help users to set up v2ray configuration files easily and automatically set the system proxy.

New bugfix version.
Prevent messing up vcore logs
upstream: solved QTimer issue and golang memory leak issue
fix: fixed duplicated scheme:// in GNOME system settings
add: added os process signals support
add: enable hiding Qv2ray when performing screenshot, fixed #283
